properties.displayName: Suspicious Redirection to Local Admin Share
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains ">" and (ProcessCommandLine contains "\\\\127.0.0.1\\admin$\\" or ProcessCommandLine contains "\\\\localhost\\admin$\\")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects a suspicious output redirection to the local admins share, this technique is often found in malicious scripts or hacktool stag
